content.description:
This is the obvious crack on the south side of the major formation (Sentinel Rock).  Diagonal up and left in the gully to the base of the formal crack, stem through to clip a bolt and then enjoy the lie-back following the crack system to the first ledge.  Make a few moves to a second little ledge, then follow the crack to where it dissipates.  Then continue up past two bolts to gain a dyke and follow it to the summit anchors. (100')   

  This route shares the first 50' with Sinful Acts.
content.protection: Camalots C3 #3 to C4 #3, Stoppers, Quickdraw.

climbs.name: Tea & Crumpets
climbs.fa: April 2021 Ground Up Gabe & Rachel Skiera

content.description: NW side of the formation. This route leads to a sub-summit of the Sentinel. Start in the chimney and follow that till it ends. Continue up the face to the top.
content.location: Follow the cliff around past 'Empty Quiver'. Locate the spire with the chimney you can see through with a fun looking face at the top.

content.description:
This is the obvious crack on the south side of the major formation (Sentinel Rock). Diagonal up and left in the gully to the base of the formal crack, stem through to clip a bolt and then enjoy the lie-back following the crack system to the first ledge. Make a few moves to a second little ledge, then follow the crack for approx 10' and then transition to the right and clip a bolt on the face, gaining access to the slightly over-hanging crack.  Gain this crack and take it to the summit anchors. 

  This route shares the first 50' with Unforgivable Acts to where the crack dissipates.
content.protection: Camalots C4 #.75-#4 (bring doubles in #2,#3), Stoppers, Long Slings.
content.location:
To access Lost Arrow Spire, BB, and Sentinel Rock:   Park at the Breezy Point Parking Lot, follow the sidewalk to the NW for 60' until the sidewalk curves up and left. Depart the sidewalk and gain the old road bed and follow it for 300' until the road curves sharply to the left. There is a single track trail located at the curve that descends down from the road, follow this for 25' to intersect another trail on the left that follows the drainage down. Take this for approx 300' to the base of Lost Arrow Spire, BB, and Sentinel Rock on the south side of the formations. 

  Sentinel Rock is the major formation of the 3; located to the NE of Lost Arrow Spire and BB. 

  Web Link to Google Map: 

maps.google.com/maps/ms?msa…;>>>>

climbs.name: Pop Your Clogs
climbs.fa: Gabe Skiera, Anna & Dustin Swanson June 2021

content.description: NW side of the formation. This route leads to a sub-summit of the Sentinel. Start up the light brown streak climbers right of Tea & Crumpets chimney. Follow it to the roof and reach out left around it (going right is an easier variation).  Continue towards the flake and the last bit of face climbing to the top.  Shares anchors with Tea & Crumpets.
content.protection: Small gear for the first bit, .2-.75 BD and a #4 before the bolt1 bolt on the face2 bolt anchor
content.location: Follow the cliff around past 'Empty Quiver'. Locate the spire with the chimney you can see through with a fun looking face at the top.

content.description: It is the major formation in the Breezy Point Area of Rushmore. Sentinel Rock in co-located, just to the NE of Lost Arrow Spire and BB. It provides a spectacular view of the range in all directions.
